amendment.description: To provide for a tax credit for offering employer-based health insurance coverage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2642 not agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2642 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S13120, S13129) To provide for a tax credit for offering employer-based health insurance coverage.
